Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the New York City Police Department to make crime statistics at each housing development operated by the New York City Housing Authority available through its web site, as well as to make other crime information at such housing developments available to the Council.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Make crime statistics at each housing development operated by the NYC Housing Authority available through its web site.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the police department to submit to the council reports of crime involving illegally obtained firearms.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the police department to submit to the council reports of crime involving illegally obtained firearms.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the police department to submit reports concerning the discharge of firearms.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the police department to submit reports concerning the discharge of firearms to the council.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the police department to submit reports to the city council concerning towed vehicles.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the police department to submit reports to the city council concerning vehicle seizures.
